__e: I've even had fantasies of maybe leaving Doug for him.
Sitting around looking out of the window to kill time is one thing, but doing it the way you are, with binoculars and wild opinions about every little thing you see, is diseased!
Dude, honestly, does anybody fantasize about their wife?
What do you do if you met the love, though he exists only in one's fantasy - And there is no chance of it will meet, for he is pretending?
The one man in all of your fantasy and the one woman in all of his. You could have made each other happy.
What? Children often get caught halfway between fantasy and... and reality. And he's only six.
